body:
So basically, I've been around for maybe 2-3 months, and then just one day.. I was gone. The fact is that I'm getting a bit bored of avicus and school ( and a bit of sports ) is taking my time to play on here. 
This is not really any kind of quitting post, I just want the people who actually care, I won't be on as much as I once was. I had some great times on avicus, all the killfarming and new friends I made. I even somehow almost got jr.mod, which was really cool and fun for me. 

But as I said, I won't be on as much as I once was. I hope to see you sometime in the furture or maybe just on another server, Good luck to you all and thanks, for being there!

Extra thanks to:
Jozz / Fluenza_
Zeus
Adrianosborne
S3M3L
AtditC
Arach
And a lot of other guys that I can't keep in mind :c

replies.body:
I feel exactly like you do, at first it felt really good to play on Avicus and I felt very welcomed, when you are constantly attacked (no namedroping) you do feel less welcomed and the fun in playing on Avicus is gone. I still play but not as much as before and I don't give a fudge about my stats, because, at the end of the day, this is only a game, I get on just because of you guys, not because of the game.

Du får höra av dig om det är något, bara skicka iväg ett meddelande på skype, jag hjälper till, vad det än gäller. Och skit fullständigt i Dynam0FTW, han är bara ett barn.
